name: argmate
author: Mathias Rengel Wulff
description: Ultra fast CLI argument parser with developer-friendly config and features

scripts.test-ci: yarn test-format && yarn test && yarn build && yarn test-cli
scripts.test-format: prettier --list-different . || (echo 'Please correct file formatting using `yarn format` and try again.' && exit 1)
scripts.preversion: yarn && yarn format && yarn test && yarn build && yarn test-cli
scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push && git push --tags && echo "Successfully released version $npm_package_version"
